name: 10 Seconds to KILL yourself
description:
current version: 0.3
The name says it all.

The mafia is coming in order to torture you...
Use your environment to get yourself killed within 10 seconds.
It's a physics & ragdoll puzzle game.
__________________________

This is a prototype made for "a game a week".
It only consists of 3 Levels/Puzzles yet.

If you like the concept and would like to have more levels, just comment or suggest ideas for new levels.
